title: Some pros explaining global presence and why shen is silly
body:
http://na.lolesports.com/articles/global-ganking-twisted-fate-and-shen

If you are average and don't get why shen is silly then please read this.
If you are good you probably don't need to read this but skip to the end and see the stuff about tahm kench and twisted fate and what theyre doing to the meta.

If you are bad then just read this to learn what global presence means...
